main event: An observer in Santa Fe, New Mexico, reported sighting a spherical, whitish-gray, semi-transparent object that changed speed and direction unexpectedly and then suddenly disappeared.
interesting points: The observer felt the object was at too high an altitude to be a balloon., The object was described as having a bright metallic appearance., The size of the object was estimated to be about 35 to 40 feet in diameter., The object was claimed to move at a speed greater than 1000 mph., The sighting lasted for 1 to 2 minutes during clear night conditions.
sighted object: spherical, whitish-gray object in the sky
witness description: The observer has military experience as a USAF Security Police.
